column4: Hey guys, having trouble booting into my Ubuntu machine. It says the filesystem down't have /sbin/init and cannot find file/directories /root/dev /root/sys or /root/proc to moount
I check one of my lost+found folders and it is full of subfolders and files, including bash
it was fine last night, but this morning i was getting a few weird things happening andn ow this
How long have you had it installed?
